TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsLong extends System.Object
public ref class IsLong abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示修改的整數是標準 C++ 值。

span.span: Indicates that a modified integer is a standard C++ value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C + + 標準指出`long`值和整數值是不同的類型。The C++ standard indicates that a `long` value and an integer value are distinct types. 不過，它們都表示使用`ELEMENT_TYPE_I4`組件中。However, they are both represented using `ELEMENT_TYPE_I4` in an assembly. 為了區分`long`從 c + + 中的整數，Microsoft c + + 編譯器會加入修飾詞加入的任何執行個體`long`執行個體時 emited。To distinguish a `long` from an integer in C++, the Microsoft C++ compiler adds the modifier to any instance of a `long` when the instance is emited. 此程序是非常重要的維護語言層級型別安全。This process is critically important for maintaining language-level type safety. 編譯器會發出中繼資料，以變更預設行為不適用時，在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器，處理值的方式中的自訂修飾詞。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 當 JIT 編譯器遇到的自訂修飾詞時，它會處理修飾詞指定的方式中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 編譯器可以套用的自訂修飾詞來方法、 參數和傳回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 編譯器的必要修飾詞必須回應，但可以忽略的選擇性修飾詞。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 您可以發出自訂修飾詞至中繼資料，使用下列技巧：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法類別如， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 產生 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令檔，其中包含呼叫`modopt`和`modreq`，然後將組合至檔案最[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用 unmanaged 的反映 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何發出使用反映的組件的物件。The following example demonstrates how to emit an object into an assembly using reflection. [!code-cpp[Runtime.CompilerServices.IsLong#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.IsLong/cpp/sample.cpp#1)]
